verbose_text: We found that RC48 exerted stronger tumor suppressive activity in PDX models with HER2 amplification than those with HER2 non amplification by inactivating the PI3K/AKT/mTOR and MAPK pathways.
evidence: HER2 amplification than those with HER2 non-amplification                         by inactivating the PI3K/AKT/mTOR
